nodes.text: The Serenno theater was one of the six theaters of operations of the Outer Rim Sieges, which took place during the final stages of the Clone Wars.
The Serenno theater was located in the Outer Rim Territories, along the Hydian Way. This field of operations was named after the key Separatist world of Serenno.
In the Serenno theater, Jedi-led fleets from the Republic Navy assaulted New Bornalex and Ord Radama in an attempt to reach the key world of Celanon and Count Dooku's homeworld of Serenno.
